message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $180. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product, but I cannot exceed $150. I hope this is within your range.
